contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|revival}} '''Revival''' may refer to: *[[Resuscitation]] of a person *[[Language revival]] of an extinct language *[[Revival (sports team)]] of a defunct team *[[Revival (television)]] of a former television series *[[Revival (theatre)]] of a former hit play in a new production {{tocright}} == Architectural movements == *[[Revivalism (architecture)]] == Music == *Albums: **[[Revival (Jully Black album)|''Revival'' (Jully Black album)]] **[[Revival (Core album)|''Revival'' (Core album)]] **[[Revival (John Fogerty album)|''Revival'' (John Fogerty album)]] **[[Revival (Tara Oram album)|''Revival'' (Tara Oram album)]] **''Revival'', by [[Reid Paley]] **[[Revival (Petra album)|''Revival'' (Petra album)]] **[[Revival (Reverend Horton Heat album)|''Revival'' (Reverend Horton Heat album)]] **[[Revival (Gillian Welch album)|''Revival'' (Gillian Welch album)]] **[[Revival (The Answer album)|''Revival'' (The Answer album)]] *Songs: **[[Revival (Deerhunter song)|"Revival" (Deerhunter song)]] **[[Revival (Eurythmics song)]] **"Revival", by [[The Allman Brothers Band]] from their 1970 album ''[[Idlewild South]]'' **"Revival", by [[Soulsavers]] *''Revival'', [[Charles Davis Tillman]]'s series of hymnals which influenced the development of Southern gospel *[[Revival Records]], a record label == Religion == *[[Christian revival]], a revival of religious fervor or fervent traditions *[[Revival meeting]] *[[Revival Centres International]], a church group *''The Revival'', [[Charles Davis Tillman|Charles Davis Tillman's]] series of hymnals which influenced the development of Southern Gospel *[[Islamic revival]], an ongoing process since the 1970s == Geography == *[[Revival, Jamaica]], a settlement in Westmoreland Parish == Other uses == *[[Aitaira]] (''Revival''), a political party in Abkhazia *[[The Revival (UK magazine)|''The Revival'' (UK magazine)]], a magazine for British Muslims *[[Revival (quartet)]], a barbershop quartet {{disambiguation}} [[ru:Возрождение (значения)]]
